description: This file defines the MessageRepository class which implements data access methods for Message entities using Entity Framework Core. It includes methods to add messages, retrieve conversations between users, and save changes.

classes.name: MessageRepository
classes.description: Repository class for managing Message entities in the database, implementing IMessageRepository interface.

methods.name: AddAsync
methods.description: Asynchronously adds a Message entity to the database context.

methods.name: GetConversationAsync
methods.description: Retrieves a list of Message entities representing a conversation between two users, with optional pagination.

methods.name: SaveChangesAsync
methods.description: Asynchronously saves all changes made in the context to the database.
